resources.string: Note: We recommend that cards on mobile have 8dp margins. android:layout_margin will NOT work in default styles (eg. materialCardViewStyle) so either set this attr directly on a MaterialCardView in the layout or add it to a style that is applied in the layout with style="@style/.... Note: Without an app:strokeColor, the card will not render a stroked border, regardless of the app:strokeWidth value.
